actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to modify the project for Ashtabula Harbor, Ohio, to authorize the enlargement of a turning basin.

summary.text: Modifies the Ashtabula Harbor, Ohio, navigation project to authorize the enlargement of the turning basin known as area E by extending it eastward for up to 500 feet and northward to within 150 feet of the east breakwater.

titles.title: A bill to modify the project for Ashtabula Harbor, Ohio, to authorize the enlargement of a turning basin.
